title: Geliyoo – Search Engine Revolution
subtitle: Building Turkey's Next-Generation Search Platform
overview: Geliyoo Bilişim is a Turkish multinational corporation specializing in Internet-related services. The company envisioned creating a complete ecosystem of digital products including a search engine, news portal, mapping service, and web browser to serve millions of Turkish users.
challenge: They needed a team to develop a search engine, a news portal, Geliyoo Maps, and a browser — all together. The founder searched many big companies, but they were very expensive. The primary challenges included: Building a scalable search infrastructure capable of indexing billions of web pages, developing a real-time news aggregation system, creating an accurate mapping solution with local data, and designing a secure, fast web browser with native Turkish language support.
solution: Coreway held detailed discussions with the Geliyoo team, defined a clear scope of work, formed vendor associations, and found the right teams under budget. We assembled a specialized team of search engineers, frontend developers, and DevOps experts. Our approach included implementing a distributed search architecture using Elasticsearch clusters, developing custom web crawling and indexing systems, integrating mapping APIs with local Turkish data providers, and building a Chromium-based browser with enhanced privacy features.
process: Multiple rounds of requirement gathering and stakeholder interviews
Technology stack transparency and architecture design
Quality control and performance testing throughout
Beta testing with select user groups
results: Successfully launched all four products within 18 months
Search engine handling 10M+ queries daily within first year
News portal aggregating content from 500+ Turkish sources
Maps service covering entire Turkey with real-time traffic data
Browser achieving 100K+ downloads in first month
impact: Search engine, news portal, maps, and browser are now live, serving millions of Turkish users daily. The platform has become a viable alternative to international tech giants, promoting digital sovereignty and supporting the Turkish language ecosystem.

testimonial.quote: Coreway Solution exceeded our expectations. They not only delivered within budget but also brought innovative ideas that made our products stand out in the market.
testimonial.author: Mehmet Yılmaz

title: Orabel – Beauty E-commerce Pioneer
subtitle: Transforming Canada's Premier Beauty Destination
overview: Orabel is a leading e-commerce webstore for beauty product lovers in Canada, offering thousands of premium beauty products from international brands. With a growing customer base, they needed a robust platform to handle increased traffic and provide exceptional user experience.
challenge: The webstore was struggling with high traffic, slow loading pages, and a lengthy checkout process causing cart drops and high bounce rates. Specific pain points included: Page load times exceeding 8 seconds during peak hours, checkout process requiring 7+ steps leading to 40% cart abandonment, poor mobile experience causing high bounce rates, and ineffective SEO resulting in low organic traffic.
solution: Coreway migrated the platform to Magento 2, optimized brand communication, deployed powerful SEO tactics, and made calculated UI & UX improvements. Our comprehensive solution included implementing Varnish caching and Redis for performance optimization, redesigning the checkout flow to 3 simple steps, creating a mobile-first responsive design, optimizing product images and implementing lazy loading, and deploying advanced SEO strategies including schema markup and content optimization.
process: Platform migration planning from Magento 1 to Magento 2
Custom theme development with mobile-first approach
UI/UX redesign based on user behavior analysis
Checkout flow simplification and A/B testing
Quality assurance and user acceptance testing
results: Page load time reduced from 8s to 2.5s
Organic traffic grew by 145% within 6 months
impact: Reduced bounce rate, improved conversion, and enhanced customer experience. Orabel became one of Canada's fastest-growing beauty e-commerce platforms, with monthly revenue increasing by 120% year-over-year.

testimonial.quote: The transformation Coreway brought to our platform was remarkable. Our customers love the new experience, and our business metrics have never been better.
testimonial.author: Sarah Chen
